name: WildRanger
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wild ranger
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Looking for a fun way for your kids to learn? Wild Ranger is here to make kid's learning an adventure.

It is a story based role playing game which let kids become explorers and travel through different locations like forests and mountains to find the final treasure. Kids must answer questions along the way to move ahead in their journey and finally reach the chest of gold to win! 

Questions along the way will include - 

 Basic addition and subtraction 
 Spellings 
 Guessing the animal. 

Win the gold and enjoy doing some fun exercises while you play and learn. 


Locations to explore:
 - forest
 - mountain (coming soon) 
 - lake (coming soon)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
